name: Cheaper Portal
description:
Your Goal is to shoot colored cubes through the same color portals and make them smash into the same color Blocks!

Controls: 

AWSD and ARROWS  to move the two players

Space - Shoot a portal with both the players

Read also in the Screenshot and watch the Trailer Video for more details on how to play

If you press N it will be loaded the next level even if you didn't finish the previous one.
